metadata.rct_status: Validation pending with MEF Associates / Urban Institute

families_served.label: Families Enrolled
families_served.methodology: Total unique families enrolled in EUC program since inception

families_with_outcomes.label: Active Families
families_with_outcomes.methodology: Families with ongoing case management in Monthly Client Review

total_wage_gains.label: Total Wage Gains
total_wage_gains.methodology: Sum of all positive wage changes recorded for program participants
total_wage_gains.data_source: Monthly Client Review wage change field

avg_wage_gain.label: Average Wage Gain per Family
avg_wage_gain.methodology: Mean wage change among families with positive outcomes

graduation_count.label: Graduated (225%+ FPL)
graduation_count.methodology: Families who reached 225% Federal Poverty Level, the EUC graduation threshold

children_impacted.label: Children in Households
children_impacted.methodology: Sum of children_in_household field for all enrolled families

positive_outcome_rate.label: Positive FPL Change Rate
positive_outcome_rate.methodology: Families with positive FPL change / families with FPL data (321/686)
positive_outcome_rate.caveat: Only 686 of 880 families have FPL data

avg_days_in_program.label: Average Days in Program
avg_days_in_program.methodology: Mean program tenure for families with outcomes

program_cost_to_date.label: Estimated Program Cost
program_cost_to_date.caveat: Based on program model estimates; actual spending may vary

total_tanf_allocation.label: Total TANF Allocation
total_tanf_allocation.methodology: 5-year TANF pilot funding from Tennessee Department of Human Services

primary.label: Lifetime ROI
primary.methodology: Lifetime family income gains / estimated program cost to date
primary.interpretation: For every $1 invested in the program, families gain $6.40 in lifetime income
caveats: Assumes wage gains persist for 20 years
Does not account for wage fade over time

taxpayer.label: Taxpayer Lifetime ROI
taxpayer.methodology: Lifetime tax revenue + benefits savings / estimated program cost
taxpayer.interpretation: Taxpayers receive $7.10 in value for every $1 invested

conservative.label: Annual Return
conservative.methodology: Annual wage gains / estimated program cost
conservative.interpretation: Program generates $1.06 in wage gains per dollar spent annually

break_even_years.label: Break-even Period
break_even_years.interpretation: Program pays for itself in under 3 years

total_annual.label: Estimated Annual Benefits Savings
total_annual.methodology: Based on families crossing FPL thresholds that trigger benefit phase-outs

building_nebraska_families.name: Building Nebraska Families
building_nebraska_families.note: Only other rural TANF RCT - showed zero impact

government.headline: Taxpayer Investment Returning $7.10 per Dollar
government.subhead: TANF pilot generating tax revenue and reducing benefit costs

foundations.headline: 880 Families Building Economic Stability
foundations.comparison_frame: vs. Year Up, Project QUEST, Jeremiah

federal.headline: Rural TANF Innovation Showing Promise
federal.subhead: Evidence building for scalable poverty intervention
federal.comparison_frame: vs. Building Nebraska Families (only other rural TANF RCT)

media.headline: 60 Families Have Escaped Poverty
media.subhead: Tennessee program helping rural families build stability

replicators.headline: What It Takes: 17 Navigators, $6M, 880 Families
replicators.subhead: Honest assessment of costs, results, and lessons learned
